RoomComponent.m_description: Canyon walls rise some distance on either side. A tumble of old branches lie strewn across the sand. A fetid stench fills the air, a dark musky scent.  Between two large boulders, a yawning tunnel opens into darkness.  Bones lie scattered around the opening, gnawed with huge teeth.  You have come across a werewolf's den. Nearby, the canyon opens into a dry wash.
